// Each mouse sprite is 32x32 pixels, each of which has two bits coded as follows:
//   0 = transparent (display background)
//   1 = black
//   2 = white
//   3 = unused
//
// The mouse pixel location is on column 16 and row 0.
// 
// There are two mouse cursors:
//
// The first mouse cursor is a classic angled arrow pointer.
//
